testcase.name: Verify the subtotal price is correct
testcase.system-out: Given Login into amazon.com.................................................passed When Search for item 'sd card' with filter capacity 64 GB...................passed And Sort by: Price: High to Low.............................................passed And Pick the first item in the list.........................................passed And Add to cart.............................................................passed And Increase quantity to 2..................................................passed Then Verify the subtotal price is correct...................................passed
